ygData.subject: Re: Burned Out Lightstone
ygData.msgSnippet: Only good as a light source. It is verants way of heading letting us know they dont like for the players to be able to easily see what creatures have loot.
ygData.messageBody:
Only good as a light source. It is verants way of heading letting us know
they dont like for the players to be able to easily see what creatures have
loot. Players just watched the wisps and only attacked the ones that cast a
light source, thus being assured of loot, being either a greater or normal
lightstone.

The burned out stone is much like the summoned light source one of the
caster classes casts. It cant be traded, dropped, or sold. And it will
vanish when you log. This keeps ALL wisp type creatures throwing a glowing
light around them so you are forced to hunt them all again and hope for
luck.
